channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Wednesday, May 26, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 Today 422 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted total of cases is 390 including changes to previous case numbers between January 5th and May 24th. The current 7 day trend of cases is 407, a decrease of -10.0% from the day before. This time last week trend was 841. This is a decrease of -52%.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 143 Edmonton Zone 67 South Zone 16 Central Zone 29 North Zone 57 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, May 25, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Regional Cases

item.title: Vaccines
Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Total VOC cases identified 43616 136 Total deaths from VOC 177 4 VOC specimens screened 72484 205 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Tue, May 25, 2021. Alberta is no longer testing all samples for VOCs, and due to previous widespread growth in VOC cases all current Covid-19 cases should be considered as VOC cases.
